argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mat2pmatbas.t | |- T = ( N matToPolyMat R ) |
| 2 |  | mat2pmatbas.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 3 |  | mat2pmatbas.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 4 |  | mat2pmatbas.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 5 |  | mat2pmatbas.c | |- C = ( N Mat P ) |
| 6 |  | mat2pmatbas0.h | |- H = ( Base ` C ) |
| 7 |  | #P_crngring | |- ( R e. CRing -> R e. Ring ) |
| 8 | 2 | #P_matring | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> A e. Ring ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing ) -> A e. Ring ) |
| 10 | 4 | #P_ply1ring | |- ( R e. Ring -> P e. Ring ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. CRing -> P e. Ring ) |
| 12 | 5 | #P_matring | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ P e. Ring ) -> C e. Ring ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing ) -> C e. Ring ) |
| 14 | 9, 13 | #P_jca | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing ) -> ( A e. Ring /\ C e. Ring ) ) |
| 15 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_mat2pmatghm | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> T e. ( A GrpHom C ) ) |
| 16 | 7, 15 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing ) -> T e. ( A GrpHom C ) ) |
| 17 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_mat2pmatmhm | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing ) -> T e. ( ( mulGrp ` A ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` C ) ) ) |
| 18 | 16, 17 | #P_jca | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing ) -> ( T e. ( A GrpHom C ) /\ T e. ( ( mulGrp ` A ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` C ) ) ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` A ) = ( mulGrp ` A ) |
| 20 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` C ) = ( mulGrp ` C ) |
| 21 | 19, 20 | #P_isrhm | |- ( T e. ( A RingHom C ) <-> ( ( A e. Ring /\ C e. Ring ) /\ ( T e. ( A GrpHom C ) /\ T e. ( ( mulGrp ` A ) MndHom ( mulGrp ` C ) ) ) ) ) |
| 22 | 14, 18, 21 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. CRing ) -> T e. ( A RingHom C ) ) |
